text: Markovo () is the name of several rural localities in Russia. ==Amur Oblast== As of 2010, one rural locality in Amur Oblast bears this name: *Markovo, Amur Oblast, a selo in Markovsky Rural Settlement of Blagoveshchensky District ==Chelyabinsk Oblast== As of 2010, one rural locality in Chelyabinsk Oblast bears this name: *Markovo, Chelyabinsk Oblast, a village in Khutorsky Selsoviet of
